content.query:
drop EXTERNAL TABLE [ADLS_Audit].[csv_scr_file_inf]
go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [ADLS_Audit].[csv_scr_file_inf]
(
      CSV_File_Name       VARCHAR(500),
      Raw_GitHub_URL      VARCHAR(1000),
      Target_Path         VARCHAR(1000),
      Has_Header          BIT,
      Delimiter           VARCHAR(10),
      Schema_Definition   VARCHAR(MAX),
      Load_Status         VARCHAR(100),
      Load_Timestamp      DATETIME2,
      Comments            VARCHAR(MAX),
      Toimport            INT,
      DataLayer           VARCHAR(50)
    )
WITH
(
	--LOCATION = 'abfss://audit@adlsrmadwdev.dfs.core.windows.net/csv_metadata/csv_scr_file_inf.parquet/*.parquet',
	LOCATION = 'https://adlsrmadwdev.blob.core.windows.net/audit/csv_metadata/csv_scr_file_inf.parquet/part-00000-b9e8151e-293c-4852-a256-3411a49deb38-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [MyADLSDataSource],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
)
